examples: My husband's favorite genre of music is pop.
Different genres of music appeal to different people, and for me, classical music really floats my boat.
While growing up, he had been exposed to various musical genres at his mother's knee, developing a diverse appreciation for music.
The game strikes a great balance between accessibility for younger players and a rewarding challenge for veterans of the genre.
The book was pretty dull and didn't really stand out from other similar books in the genre.
words.defineEn: a style of art, music, literature, film, etc. that has its own special features
words.defineVi: một phong cách nghệ thuật, âm nhạc, văn học, phim, v.v. có những nét đặc biệt riêng

examples: My husband's favorite genre of music is pop.
James nervously popped the question to his girlfriend during a romantic dinner.
Cripps pink apples add a pop of color and a sweet-tart taste to my fruit salad.
I keep my students on their toes with pop quizzes.
Pop is a feast to the ears of many, but I despise it.
words.defineEn: music that is popular, either as a genre with catchy tunes and lyrics or as a selection of the current popular songs from different genres
words.defineVi: nhạc phổ biến, hoặc là thể loại có giai điệu và lời bài hát hấp dẫn hoặc là tuyển tập các bài hát nổi tiếng hiện nay từ các thể loại khác nhau

examples: As a born and bred Texan, Mark has a deep appreciation for country music and barbecues.
The simplicity of country music is its power.
AMNA NAWAZ: The songs of Loretta Lynn have spanned generations of country music fans.
Songwriter Harlan Howard famously called country music three chords and the truth.
Maybe no instrument or sound is more associated with country music than Pedal Steel Guitar.
words.defineEn: a type of music that is originally from the southern parts of the United States
words.defineVi: một thể loại âm nhạc có nguồn gốc từ các vùng phía nam của Hoa Kỳ

examples: Luther lived at a time when the Bible was only available in Latin.
The word comes from the Latin for "one's own grasp."
Its proper Latin name is lunellum, for its crescent-moon shape.
Where they speak Latin?
In fact, the Latin word draco is used for both dragons and snakes.
words.defineEn: a genre of music that originated in Latin America
words.defineVi: một thể loại âm nhạc có nguồn gốc từ Mỹ Latinh

words.defineEn: a type of music that combines elements of jazz and blues, developed by African-Americans in the 1940s
words.defineVi: một thể loại âm nhạc kết hợp các yếu tố của nhạc jazz và blues, do người Mỹ gốc Phi phát triển vào những năm 1940

examples: Different genres of music appeal to different people, and for me, classical music really floats my boat.
He wasn't lampooning just one composer, but rather the classical music establishment, which he felt was stuck in the past.
The recording seemed to strike a chord when it was released last spring, spending 13 straight weeks at the top of the classical music charts.
When Kev Marcus and Wil B. met in a high school music class, they shared their desire to disrupt people's impressions of what classical music should be.
(classical music) Put that 'nana up.
words.defineEn: music that originated in Europe, has everlasting value, long-established rules, and elaborated forms
words.defineVi: âm nhạc bắt nguồn từ châu Âu, có giá trị vĩnh cửu, các quy tắc được thiết lập lâu đời và các hình thức phức tạp

examples: That movie knocked my socks off.
The movie follows the book faithfully.
The movie follows the book faithfully.
The movie broke all box-office records.
The movie broke box office records in the US.
words.defineEn: a story that is told with a series of pictures that move and sound, shown on television or in a cinema
words.defineVi: một câu chuyện được kể bằng một loạt hình ảnh chuyển động và âm thanh, được chiếu trên truyền hình hoặc trong rạp chiếu phim

examples: But he needs a soundtrack.
Just like Disney soundtracks and musicals, the K-pop industry loves its modulations.
And download the soundtrack on iTunes or Google Play Music.
In media, a dramatic scene or event can be the inspiration for an incredible soundtrack.
And that was honestly one of my favourite soundtracks.
words.defineEn: the recorded sounds, speeches, or music of a movie, play, or musical
words.defineVi: âm thanh, bài phát biểu hoặc âm nhạc được ghi lại của một bộ phim, vở kịch hoặc vở nhạc kịch

examples: Do you really have a crush on folk dancers?
The procrastinator complained about not having enough time to pursue their hobbies, but idle folk have the least leisure, and their lack of productivity left them with little free time.
The prophet and his God felt as one, but that attachment cannot be felt nor understood by the common folk.
The human resources manager understood that her employees had varying needs and preferences, and created a flexible work environment to accommodate them - different strokes for different folks.
Add up all the comments above, and it seems a lot of folks are blowing smoke up a lot of other folk's rears.
words.defineEn: music that originates from and reflects the traditional culture of a particular region or community, often featuring acoustic instruments and storytelling lyrics
words.defineVi: âm nhạc bắt nguồn và phản ánh văn hóa truyền thống của một vùng hoặc cộng đồng cụ thể, thường có nhạc cụ acoustic và lời bài hát kể chuyện

examples: He played a tune on his harmonica.
Millions tune in to watch the thrills and spills of stock car racing.
The ice cream truck played a catchy tune to attract customers.
From now on, I call the tune and you follow orders.
There is many a good tune played on an old fiddle.
words.defineEn: a number of musical notes that form a piece of music when played or sung in a particular order
words.defineVi: một số nốt nhạc tạo thành một bản nhạc khi chơi hoặc hát theo một thứ tự cụ thể

examples: She downloaded a new movie to watch on her laptop during the flight.

We have made the necessary documents available for download on our website.
The tech company developed a new app, confident that 'if you build it, they will come' and download it to use for their everyday needs.
words.defineEn: to add data to a computer from the Internet or another computer
words.defineVi: để thêm dữ liệu vào máy tính từ Internet hoặc máy tính khác

examples: Their last album sold millions.
The singer is in the spotlight for her new album release.
The album's success has put it at the top of the charts.
The new album by that band is going down a bomb with music fans all over the world.
The musician's new album is a masterpiece, with every song knocking it out of the park.
words.defineEn: a number of music pieces or songs sold as a single item, normally on a CD or the internet
words.defineVi: một số bản nhạc hoặc bài hát được bán dưới dạng một mặt hàng, thường là trên đĩa CD hoặc internet

examples: I was enjoying every single cut of marinated chicken, beef, and pork.
The ticket for the bus is valid for a single journey.
My siblings and I share a single bedroom in our house.
Some of the people don't deserve a single red cent.
Not a single jot or tittle goes past the eye of the boss without her noticing.
words.defineEn: a CD or a musical record that has only one main song
words.defineVi: đĩa CD hoặc đĩa nhạc chỉ có một bài hát chính

examples: Alice's song hits the airwaves.
That song always sends a shiver down my spine.

That band's new song is really off the hook!
She bought the painting for a song.
words.defineEn: a piece of music that has words
words.defineVi: một bản nhạc có lời

words.defineEn: a short video that is made to promote a specific song
words.defineVi: một video ngắn được thực hiện để quảng bá một bài hát cụ thể

examples: The newspaper has an entertainment section with movie reviews and celebrity news.
Let's have a movie night upstairs in the entertainment room.

words.defineEn: movies, television shows, etc. or an activity that is made for people to enjoy
words.defineVi: phim, chương trình truyền hình, v.v. hoặc một hoạt động được tạo ra để mọi người thưởng thức

examples: The east is known for its rich cultural heritage.

I enjoy attending cultural events like concerts or theater performances on Saturdays.
London is the capital city of the United Kingdom and a major cultural and economic hub.
words.defineEn: involving a society's culture, traditions, beliefs, and other related matters
words.defineVi: liên quan đến văn hóa, truyền thống, tín ngưỡng của một xã hội và các vấn đề liên quan khác

examples: Their bread and butter is reporting local events.
The event finished with a spectacular fireworks display.

The tragic event tore the community out of its sense of normalcy.

words.defineEn: anything that takes place, particularly something important
words.defineVi: bất cứ điều gì diễn ra, đặc biệt là một cái gì đó quan trọng

words.defineEn: a story that we can watch on a screen, like a TV or in a theater, with moving pictures and sound
words.defineVi: một câu chuyện mà chúng ta có thể xem trên màn hình, chẳng hạn như TV hoặc trong rạp hát, với hình ảnh và âm thanh chuyển động

examples: The manager played his strongest side of the season.

words.defineEn: a written story that is meant to be performed on a stage, radio, or television
words.defineVi: một câu chuyện bằng văn bản có nghĩa là sẽ được thực hiện trên sân khấu, đài phát thanh hoặc truyền hình

examples: His favorite band is playing a concert on Friday night.

The concert went a bomb and the audience loved every minute of it.
We had a good time at the concert last night.
words.defineEn: a public performance by musicians or singers
words.defineVi: một buổi biểu diễn công cộng của nhạc sĩ hoặc ca sĩ

examples: My wife talked sense into me.
Your friend really talks a blue streak!
The two men talked.
A true leader walks the talk.
He talked a blue streak all through breakfast.
words.defineEn: a lecture or speech given to an audience on a specific subject
words.defineVi: một bài giảng hoặc bài phát biểu cho khán giả về một chủ đề cụ thể

examples: Today's lecture bored the pants off me.

Today's lecture bored me to death.

words.defineEn: a talk given to an audience about a particular subject to educate them, particularly at a university or college
words.defineVi: một cuộc nói chuyện dành cho khán giả về một chủ đề cụ thể để giáo dục họ, đặc biệt là tại một trường đại học hoặc cao đẳng

words.defineEn: a public event where people can display or sometimes sell their works of art
words.defineVi: một sự kiện công cộng nơi mọi người có thể trưng bày hoặc đôi khi bán các tác phẩm nghệ thuật của họ
